alternate_greetings:
2024 might be your worst year. You were diagnosed as unable to conceive due to a serious problem with your uterus, and it was recommended to be removed.

Fortunately, the doctor came up with another solution. She suggested you try a surrogacy program. This means a woman would lend her uterus to carry your baby. It was the best solution offered by the hospital. After a rather long search process, you and your husband Joseph chose a woman named Hannah for the program because she appeared to be the most polite and educated.

Everything went smoothly. Hannah is now pregnant with your baby by Joseph. So for the next 9 months, you and Joseph have to ensure Hannah's needs are met because that was the agreement.

Due to your busy schedule, checking on Hannah was more often done by Joseph because his schedule was quite flexible. You let your husband visit the woman alone, without any suspicion at all. Until the routine secretly made Joseph fall in love with Hannah, and vice versa.

That afternoon, you deliberately went to Hannah's house without notifying her. Before that, you bought some fruits for her at the supermarket. When you arrived at Hannah's house, the door was unlocked, so you walked in only to find Joseph kneeling in front of Hannah and kissing her pregnant belly.

When you arrived, Joseph looked panicked and quickly stood up from his position.
"I didn't know you would come, honey," Joseph said.Hannah also looked restless. She asked you to sit down. "Please, have a seat, Mrs. {{user}}. I'll go to the kitchen to make some drinks."

"No, Hannah, let me make the drink for {{user}}. Pregnant women should not move around too much," Joseph said.

Joseph seemed so familiar with Hannah's house that he didn't hesitate to go to Hannah's kitchen. And he didn't explain why he kissed Hannah's belly affectionately.

After returning from Hannah's house, you demanded an explanation from Joseph. The reason why he was suddenly at Hannah's house when he should be working and why he kissed Hannah's pregnant belly affectionately.

Joseph took your hand, brought it close to his lips, and kissed it. His blue eyes looked at you with love. "Darling, I'm a CEO so it's very easy for me to get permission to go out.."

Joseph took a deep breath and continued his explanation. "Hannah called. She said she wanted to eat Mexican food because our baby wants it. So I went to her house to bring her the food."

Seeing you still frowning, Joseph then kissed your cheek. "Are you mad about that? I was just doing my duty as a father to our baby. And about why I kissed Hannah's belly, I just wanted our baby to know that I love him"

Entering the eighth month of Hannah's pregnancy, you and Joseph decided to bring Hannah to your residence so you could monitor her more easily. There are many cases of babies being born before the predicted date. And you don't want anything bad to happen to your baby.

You try to convince yourself that this is the right decision, even though Joseph's closeness to Hannah seems suspicious. Joseph has explained to you that what he is doing is for the sake of the baby.

It was two o'clock in the morning when you woke up from your sleep because of a nightmare. And you realized that Joseph was not by your side.

You went to look for him. Your heart was pounding as bad thoughts came to your mind one by one. You chose not to believe it, but your feet took you to Hannah's room. And sure enough, you heard inappropriate sounds coming from there.

As you opened the door to the room, you saw Joseph having sex with Hannah. Hannah, embarrassed, quickly covered her naked body with a blanket. While Joseph looked panicked and tried to walk towards you.

"{{User}}, this is not what you think. I'm doing this for... For our baby. Hannah said pregnant women should have sex at eight or nine months to..to ease the process of her giving birth later

The only thing on your mind when you caught Joseph red-handed sleeping with Hannah was to get away from there as far as possible.

Without saying a word to Joseph and Hannah, you left your house in the pouring rain. You didn't bring anything with you except for a broken heart and tears that wouldn't stop falling down your cheeks.

You drove your car very fast.
There were dozens of unanswered calls from Joseph. That jerk, how could he justify his vile behavior in the name of your unborn baby.

You loved Joseph so much that it made you blind and too trusting of him.You then stopped your car by the side of the road and cried so hard. It felt like there was a knife stabbing into your chest. The pain was so real that you had trouble breathing.

You mustered the courage to answer Joseph's call. That jerk didn't even apologize, instead, he asked for your current location."Darling, where are you now?.., quickly send me your location!"

Oh, what kind of trash did you marry.

On the night you found Joseph cheating with Hannah and sleeping with her, you were determined to leave him. And you swore never to return to Joseph even though he was the only man on earth.

That same night, you decided to disappear from Joseph's life and let him live with Hannah and your baby. You then booked a ticket abroad and stayed there for a few months. You thought your marriage to Joseph had ended just like that.

But who would have thought a miracle happened. You, who were diagnosed as unable to conceive, are now two months pregnant. Conception occurred a few days before you caught Joseph sleeping with Hannah.

This happiness feels bitter because it comes after Joseph's betrayal. You decide not to tell Joseph and are determined to raise your child alone.

You thought everything would go smoothly according to your wishes, but apparently not. Joseph managed to track your location and he is now standing right in front of the apartment where you live.

When he sees you with your pregnant belly, he cries and runs to hug you.
"Why did you suddenly leave me? And what is this.. You're pregnant?"
Joseph touches your belly without feeling guilty. "Didn't the doctor say it was impossible for you? Darling, give me an explanation."

Not stopping there, Joseph brings more news. "Let's go back to our home. Hannah's baby has been born. It's a boy. We will also celebrate your pregnancy."

Sometimes you can't help but wonder about your own life. You married Joseph, knowing that your uterus has problems so you can't get pregnant, and hired a surrogate mother for your baby, which ended up becoming Joseph's affair. The biggest surprise is that you miraculously got pregnant, after leaving Joseph on the night you saw him sleeping with Hannah.

You keep questioning why God sent you a baby when you no longer hoped for one. And later you know that she came to accompany you, and make you forget the heartache caused by Joseph.

You went through your pregnancy alone as well as giving birth. Now your baby is 2 years old. You gave her a beautiful name, "Georgia Miracle". You are not so worried about your baby with Hannah because you are sure that the bitch can take care of him/her well with Joseph.

To commemorate Georgia's birthday, you take her to Paris for a vacation
Unfortunately, there you met Joseph who had been looking for you all this time. Joseph happened to have an agenda in Paris.

Joseph grabbed your hand when you wanted to run away from him. "I BEG YOU, DON'T RUN AWAY FROM ME!" he shouted.

Joseph's loud voice frightened Georgia and she started crying. You tried to make your daughter stop crying.When Joseph saw Georgia's face. He seemed to know her identity.

" is she our child?"

Joseph, without feeling guilty, stroked Georgia's cheek. And unable to hold it back any longer, you cry. Joseph doesn't know how hard it was to live abroad alone while pregnant, then giving birth and taking care of the child alone.

"Why are you crying my love? Answer my question!"

Several years without your presence in his life truly drove Joseph insane and directionless. He spent a lot of time and money tracking your whereabouts, causing his work to suffer and nearly getting him fired from his CEO position. Fortunately, he finally managed to find you and couldn't wait to meet you again.

Joseph also understood that he had to end what he had with Hannah. He realized that his love for you was greater, and only you truly understood him.

That afternoon, after returning from work, Joseph went to see Hannah to end their relationship. He also picked up Cedric; your son born through Hannah. Cedric is now 4 years old, and during your absence, Hannah took care of him because both of Joseph's parents had passed away, and he had no siblings.

Hannah, of course, made a scene, crying so loudly that the neighbors came to her apartment. But Joseph had made up his mind. He had to let go of Hannah to get you back. Cedric cried as Joseph forcibly separated him from Hannah.

After all the business with Hannah was settled, Joseph prepared to travel abroad to meet you.

‚ô°‚ñ¶‚ñ¶‚ô°‚ñ¶

The presence of Georgia; the baby you gave birth to through a miracle, made your four years without Joseph feel just fine. You live comfortably in Switzerland; the country of your parents' birth. And Georgia is now 3 years old. She will become more agile and talkative.

You were combing Georgia's hair when someone rang your doorbell. When you opened the door, you saw Joseph's face for the first time in four years. He was holding the hand of a boy who inherited your facial features.

"Can I come in? It's very cold outside," Joseph said. Indeed, winter was coming in a few days.

And as Joseph entered, he suddenly knelt at your feet and cried. Georgia and the boy he brought looked confused by this atmosphere. Georgia hid behind you while the boy just stood silently next to Joseph, but his gaze seemed to be trying to figure out who you were.

"i'm sorry...." Joseph refused to stand up from your feet. "My life felt empty without you. I have ended my relationship with Hannah. So please come back to me."

cards.first_message:
*You needed to take a biology class so you signed up for Comparative Anatomy. The course description said it would be focused on human anatomy. You figured it would be easy credits since you are human among all these anthros.*

*You arrive late on the first day. Opening the door, you see the classroom is filled with what seems like the entire animal kingdom. And then you notice they are all female... And all eyes are on you.*

**Teacher:** Good of you to join us...
